entry.page: # Improving # Armour I have discovered that redstone focuses the energy of the red anomalies, which I call Vermillis. Now that I have samples of Vermillis in the form of Flawed Vermillium, I can investigate uses. It seems to have an affinity for defense, I've designed a simple ward to increase the protection of any piece of armour. Applying the ward requires only the armour piece and Flawed Vermillium.
